dublinCore.dc:title: 114 S1395 IS: To reinstate certain mining claims in the State of Alaska.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Ms. Murkowski introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

form.official-title: To reinstate certain mining claims in the State of Alaska.

subsection.text: The term covered claimholder means each of—

paragraph.text: the claimholder of claims in the State of Alaska numbered AA023149, AA023163, AA47913, AA047914, AA047915, AA047916, AA047917, AA047918, and AA047919 (as of December 29, 2004); and
the claimholder of the claim in the State of Alaska numbered ADL: FF–0593215 (as of December 29, 2004).
be considered to qualify for relief under paragraph (3) of section 10101(d) of the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1993 (30 U.S.C. 28f(d)); and
have the opportunity under that paragraph to cure defects with respect to the applicable claim for any prior period during which—

subparagraph.text: there was a failure to pay claim maintenance fees.
